name: Loop Shooter
description:
This is a game made in 48 hrs for Ludum Dare 47 Compo. In the game you are a circle trapped in an infinite loop. Enemy shapes are constantly moving toward you and you must fend them off.

Controls:

Aim with the mouse cursor

Left click to shoot

Space bar to speed up (speeding up reduces your health)

Shoot powerups to activate them

Powerups:

Health increase
Direction reverse

Gun upgrade

Tools:

  • SFXR
  • Unity 2020
  • Unity Hub
  • Visual Studio Community 2019
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Paint .Net
